game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the ruins
game.description: An ancient artifact has been sighted in the old ruins to the north. It is said to hold immense mystical power. Your task is to locate this artifact and retrieve it safely
game.reward: 5000 Gold Coins and Legendary Sword 'Dragon's Fury'

tasks.description: Venture north through the treacherous Blackwood forest till you reach the abandoned ruins

tasks.objective: Investigate the ruins and locate the artifact
tasks.description: Search the ancient ruins for any traces of the artifact

tasks.objective: Retrieve the artifact and return it to Gilbert
tasks.description: Once you have found the artifact, retrieve it and return safely to Gilbert
